title: Dow Finsterwald, Golfer Known for Some Close Calls, Dies at 93
description: Finsterwald was one of the sportâ€™s most consistent money winners. But he may be best known for twice narrowly missing out on winning the Masters.
dc:creator: Richard Goldstein
media:description: Dow Finsterwald after winning the P.G.A. Championship in 1958. He finished in the money in 72 consecutive tournaments in the 1950s.
